br-shelltracker
A helper tool for the game Buckshot Roulette.

Too baked to remember how many live and blank shells there are left? Just click + or − to update the displayed counts and chances whenever the shotgun is reloaded, a shell is used, ejected, or its polarity is flipped.

GitHub · etrusci.org
